attributes.action: vote to stop the any extremist demonstrations which undermine the work of Her Majesty's Royal Forces in the war against terror, and for the safekeeping of our country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is against any extremists demonstrating against Royal Forces who are sacrificing their lives for the sake of the country.

rejection.details: Islam4UK has said it no longer plans to march through Wootton Bassett.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
